titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the deduction allowable with respect to income attributable to domestic production activities in Puerto Rico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/29/2014--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2015 the tax deduction for income attributable to domestic production activities in Puerto Rico.
